Name: Social Network Dataset
Description: Darkness is measured in a scale between 0 and 1, as darkness tends towards 1 it implies the vehicle colour is darker. Damaged is measured in a scale between 0 and 1, as damaged tends towards 1 it implies the vehicle has endured significant damage. Speeding is measured in a scale between 0 and 1, as speeding tends towards 1 it implies the vehicle is much closer to the speed limit. Gender is measured in a scale between 0 and 1, as gender tends towards 1 it implies the vehicle's driver is more masculine. Size is measured in a scale between 0 and 1, as size tends towards 1 it implies the vehicle is a large SUV.
